short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adam Assistant suggests powerful sentences that better deliver your thoughts and help readers understand your message.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adam Assistant tool helps the user to check and better understand the emotions and state of mind of the other user by analyzing their input text with real-time sentiment analysis. Adam would then recommend better responses to steer the conversations, and communicate effectively.
